Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory309.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Old Resident', 3: "Oh dear, if it weren't for you...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hahahahaha—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Resident', 3: 'Forget the cat thing. Thank you so much...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis and No. 21 approach Vera with the townsfolks from the direction they departed earlier.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Ha! We've made it here first!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "I've been waiting for you forever.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "Ha... We don't have any weapons to fight the Corrupted here. We're so glad you're here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: 'Thank you... so much. Everyone in town is still alive!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Resident', 3: 'What a handsome fella! Look at those muscles and that robotic arm!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Young Resident', 3: 'Just a squeeze and splash! The head of the Corrupted was crushed!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "That's no big deal. I'm still itching for a real fight!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "By the way... you're Noctis, right, Sir?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "I would've been dead if it weren't for you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Oh? Really? I don't remember.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: 'You might not remember, but I sure do! Look at my hair! You managed to save so much of my hair!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The tavern owner points at the scorched hair above his head before handing Noctis the whisky he could not hide in time.'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "I don't have much to give, so here you go!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Beardy', 3: "Hey, isn't that my bottle?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "Yours? No! It's Noctis' now!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Damn right! It's mine!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "And Vera, we'll answer whatever you want to know!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Tch... What was I going to ask again?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Right. Have Corrupted come here in the past?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "I don't think so? The last time we saw the Corrupted here was like six or seven years ago, from what I can recall.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Old Resident', 3: 'Yeah, yeah. They arrived during the harvest in the fall.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Resident', 3: 'That was when my grandson...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: 'I think some idiot brought back mechanoids that were infected with the Punishing Virus, which drew a bunch of Corrupted to us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Mechanoids infected with the Punishing Virus...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera suddenly thinks of something, as much as she hates to admit it.'}
{3: 'She glances at the boastful Noctis amidst the people\'s praises and No. 21 "playing" with the other children before peeking at the trunk of their car.'}
{3: 'If some Corrupted can be drawn by the Punishing Virus...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Can I bring some souvenirs back, Captain?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hm? Sure. No one else is here.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '(So... those "souvenirs" in our trunk...)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '(They led the Corrupted here.)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "What's wrong?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera sighs and continues.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Are there any special settlements northwest of Route 77? Anything weird in that direction in general?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "Any place special and weird... I don't know for sure.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "All I know is that there are more no man's lands the further northwest you go.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'It was pointless to ask, then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. 21! Noctis! Stop fooling around!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, did you hear? They were complimenting how powerful I am!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Your only power is to blow everything up.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "We're taking care of the remaining Corrupted. There are some left outside the town.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Why? Are you really changing our name to Cerberus... Volunteers?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'll allow you to resign and build your volunteer team yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Never mind.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. 21... bring the things in the trunk with us.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: 'Souvenirs?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Souvenirs. What I took from my prey—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "That's enough. Do what you're told.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "They're even taking care of the remaining Corrupted in the outskirts. How...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Old Resident', 3: 'How can we ever repay you?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tavern Owner', 3: "Supplies! Alcohol, fuel, food—ah, you guys don't eat. What about... batteries, parts... We'll give you everything.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "...There's nothing to thank us for.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's go, No. 21, Noctis.", 4: '1'}
